goal.en: This course aims to equip students with essential knowledge of matrix theory and introduce key matrix analysis techniques applicable to wireless communications and signal processing.
goal.ch: 本門課程旨在教授學生矩陣理論的基礎知識，同時介紹在無線通訊以及訊號處理領域中經常應用的矩陣分析技術。

content.en:
週次 內容
1 Introduction to Matrix Theory.
2 Review of Linear Algebra (I)
3 Review of Linear Algebra (II)
4 Review of Linear Algebra (III)
5 Inner Product Spaces (I)
6 Inner Product Spaces (II)
7 Orthogonal and Oblique Projection
8 Least Squares Problems
9 Mid-Term Exam
10 Nonlinear Least Squares Problems
11 Schur Decomposition
12 Simultaneous Diagonalization and Unitary Diagonalization
13 Singular Value Decomposition (I)
14 Singular Value Decomposition (II)
15 Perturbations in Linear Systems
16 Special Topics in Wireless Communications Using Matrix Analysis
17 Special Topics in Machine Learning using Matrix Analysis
18 Final Term Exam/Final Term Project
content.ch:
週次 內容
1 矩陣理論簡介
2 線性代數(I)
3 線性代數(II)
4 線性代數(III)
5 內積空間(I)
6 內積空間(II)
7 正交投影與斜投影
8 最小平方問題
9 期中考
10 非線性最小平方問題
11 舒爾分解
12 同步對角化與可么正對角化
13 奇異值分解(I)
14 奇異值分解(II)
15 線性系統擾動分析
16 矩陣分析應用-無線通訊專題
17 矩陣分析應用-機器學習專題
18 期末考/期末專題

textbook.en: Textbook：1. R. A. Horn and C. R. Johnson, Matrix Analysis, Cambridge University Press, 1985. 2. A. J. Laub, Matrix Analysis for Scientists and Engineers, SIAM, 2005.
